name: Cooked Chicken Breasts
recipeIngredient: 2 whole, skinless, boneless chicken breasts, about TK pounds
1 small sprig thyme or 1/2 teaspoon dried

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients in a saucepan. Partly cover and bring to the boil. Let simmer 15 minutes. Let stand until ready to use.
